sourcesContent:
Movies Genres

{{ genre.name }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { MoviesService } from 'src/app/services/movies.service'; import { Genre } from '../../models/genre'; @Component({ selector: 'app-genres', templateUrl: './genres.component.html', styleUrls: ['./genres.component.scss'] }) export class GenresComponent implements OnInit { genres: Genre[] = []; constructor(private moviesService: MoviesService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.moviesService.getMoviesGenres().subscribe((genresData) => { this.genres = genresData; console.log(genresData); }); } }
